vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.severityTooltip: The worst case impact across different environments (CVSS version 3.x base score).
vulnerabilities.probabilityTooltip: The probability that this vulnerability will be exploited in the next 30 days (EPSS probability). This data is reported by FIRST.org.
vulnerabilities.publishedTooltip: The date this vulnerability was published in the National Vulnerability Database (NVD).
vulnerabilities.detectedTooltip: The date this vulnerability first appeared on a host.

empty.title: No software found
empty.description: No software matches the current filters

page.headerDescription: Manage software and search for installed software, OS, and vulnerabilities
page.addSoftwareTooltip: Select a team to add software.
page.addSoftwareTooltipFreeTier: This feature is included in Fleet Premium.
page.updateAutomationsError: Could not update vulnerability automations. Please try again.

table.lastUpdatedTooltip: The last time software data was updated, including vulnerabilities and host counts.

os.title: Operating systems
os.description: View operating systems installed on your hosts

titles.title: Software titles
titles.description: View and manage software across your fleet

delete.title: Delete software
delete.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete
delete.warning1: Software won't be uninstalled from existing hosts, but any pending installs and uninstalls will be canceled.
delete.warning2: Installs or uninstalls currently running on a host will still complete, but results won't appear in Fleet.
delete.warning3Suffix: in software inventories and will use the default icon.
delete.gitopsWarning: You are currently in GitOps mode. If the package is defined in GitOps, it will reappear when GitOps runs.
delete.errorPolicyUsed: Couldn't delete. Policy automation uses this software. Please disable policy automation for this software and try again.
delete.errorSetupExperience: Couldn't delete. This software is installed when new Macs boot. Please remove software in Controls > Setup experience and try again.

edit.errorMaxFileSize: Couldn't edit software. The maximum file size is {{maxSize}} MB.
edit.successSelfServiceSuffix: The end user can install from Fleet Desktop.

editIcon.title: Edit software
editIcon.displayNameHelpText: Optional. If left blank, Fleet will use
editIcon.iconMessage: The icon must be a PNG file and square, with dimensions ranging from {{minDim}}x{{minDim}} px to {{maxDim}}x{{maxDim}} px.
editIcon.errorMaxFileSize: Couldn't edit. Icon must be 100KB or less.
editIcon.errorPngOnly: Couldn't edit. Must be a PNG file.
editIcon.errorDimensions: Couldn't edit. Icon must be square, between {{minDim}}x{{minDim}}px and {{maxDim}}x{{maxDim}}px.
editIcon.errorFileReader: FileReader result was not a string.
